comment._content: Lynn J. Arnold (1864-1920), bank president, newspaper publisher, lawyer, judge. www.usgennet.org/usa/ny/state/his/bio/pt34.html

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913 Lynn J. Arnold was an ex-judge, and a "lay adviser" to New York Governor William Sulzer during the Sulzer impeachment crisis.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a biography on him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lynn_John_Arnold

comment.author: 68417123@N00
comment._content: This is my great-grandfather. I have a picture of him as a child here: picasaweb.google.com/robrem/ArnoldFamily#5117450218307359266 ...suppose I could upload it to flickr, eh? :)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: robrem, at first glance your portrait appears to be a stereo pair, but the images have been transposed. Make a copy and switch the halves, and you will have a true stereographic pair.
